description:
Having broken his arm, Bunji goes to school wearing a cast.  "What`s that?" "So hard!" "So awesome!" marvel his classmates.  Bunji is delighted as he instantly becomes Mr. Popular, but he gets carried away...    Mom and the kids have come to a model home with Mrs. Morita and her son.  While Mrs. Morita is completely entranced by this perfect dream home with a wooden terrace and vaulted ceilings, Mom calmly tells her... Bunji suddenly says that he wants to be a manga artist.  He is completely into it as he sets up a small desk next to Mom`s work desk and has Daichi in the role of the assistant. This is a story from when Mom was small. In the early evening, when she was playing in the fields, her mom would call for her, "Dinner Time!"   Today`s dinner is Mom`s favorite fried noodles.
Source: crunchyroll
